title: US says 'meaningful progress' made as Ukraine talks enter second day

title: Ejaculation without penetration of penis is only attempt to rape, not rape: Chhattisgarh High Court
desc: The Court was dealing with an appeal challenging conviction in a rape case. The victim had said that the accused kept his private part above her private part but did not penetrate her.

title: NCAA: Arellano Lady Chiefs snap two-game skid as Catherine Domasig flaunts all-around game vs. JRU
desc: Arellano University rode Catherine Domasig's overall game to pull off a 25-14, 21-25, 25-16, 25-21 win against Jose Rizal University in the NCAA Season 101 women's volleyball tournament.

title: Maldives moves to merge key elections to cut costs
desc: MALE: The Maldives will hold a nationwide referendum in April to decide whether the presidential and parliamentary elections can be held on the same day to cut costs, an official said Wednesday.President Mohamed Muizzu has set the plebiscite for April 4, which if approved, would bring forward the next parliamentary vote and shorten the current legislature’s term by about five

title: Sheffield woman lost her hearing overnight in her 30s
desc: Lauren Staniforth is now profoundly deaf and doctors still cannot explain what caused it.

title: Moran accuses cllrs of strategically undermining term
desc: Limerick's directly elected Mayor John Moran has launched a scathing attack on a number of councillors, accusing them of a deliberate strategy to ensure his term as mayor is not successful.
